text: Święta wojna (eng. Holy War) is a popular Polish comedy series broadcast on TVP2 from January 23, 2000 to May 9, 2009. The series runs in Katowice. In this series characters communicate Silesian language. A 11th season is in production and will be premiered in autumn 2020.Big Return of popular polish series - Święta wojna will be continued!; RMF.FM (2019, June 14) == Cast == {| class="wikitable" |- !
